attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID for this object. The application that owns this object is responsible for generating this unique ID.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: Local code used to represent this provider

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: State assigned provider number

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name of the provider

element.name: Address
element.desc: This element contains information related to provider's address information.

element.name: Type
element.desc: Background check type

element.name: Date
element.desc: Date on which background type was checked

element.name: Description
element.desc: Description of background check performed

element.name: Description
element.desc: Certification description as defined by state

element.name: AreaAuthorized
element.desc: Area in which employee has certification

object.name: EmplAssignment
object.desc: Information about the school and assignment of employee

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: References SchoolInfo object to determine school in which this assignment pertains.

element.name: FTE
element.desc: Full-time equivalent for this school

element.name: ReportDate
element.desc: Date that report snapshot was generated

element.name: SchoolYear
element.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g., "2004" for the 2003-04 school year).

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: State assigned reporting unit number

element.name: SSN
element.desc: Employee social security number

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name of employee.

element.name: Demographics
element.desc: This element contains information related to employee demographics.

element.name: Race
element.desc: Primary employee's race

element.name: Hispanic
element.desc: Is this employee Hispanic or Latino?

element.name: Salary
element.desc: Employee's salary

element.name: Leave
element.desc: Is this employee on leave this year?

element.name: TotalYears
element.desc: Total number of years employee has been in a professional position

element.name: UnitYears
element.desc: Total number of years at current LEA

element.name: Education
element.desc: Highest level of education attained by employee.

element.name: TeachingCredentialType
element.desc: Category in which teacher is authorized to teach

element.name: TerminationCode
element.desc: If appropriate, employment separation reason

element.name: BackgroundChecks
element.desc: Information about background checks done on employee

element.name: Assignments
element.desc: Information about the school and assignment of employee

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: This is the GUID for this object.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Date in which the course or activity was completed and awarded credit.

element.name: Earned
element.desc: The number of units earned

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this staff member. This element or SSN, or both, must be included.

element.name: SSN
element.desc: Employee Social Security Number. This element or StateProvinceId, or both, must be included.

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name of employee.

element.name: Demographics
element.desc: This element contains information related to employee demographics.

element.name: ActivityName
element.desc: Name of the course or activity

element.name: ActivityType
element.desc: Type of course or activity

element.name: ActivityHours
element.desc: Total activity hours/total clock hours

element.name: Earned
element.desc: Hours attended or credits earned by the employee

element.name: DateFrom
element.desc: Start date of the course or activity

element.name: DateTo
element.desc: Ending date of the course or activity

value.name: TARDINESS
value.desc: Discharge due to continued absence or tardiness

value.name: FALSIFIED_APPLICATION
value.desc: Discharge due to a falsified application form

value.name: CREDENTIAL_REVOKED
value.desc: Discharge due to credential revoked or suspended

value.name: UNSATISFACTORY_PERFORMANCE
value.desc: Discharge due to unsatisfactory work performance

value.name: LACK_OF_FUNDING
value.desc: Lay off due to lack of funding

value.name: OUTSIDE
value.desc: Employed or affiliated with outside organization

element.name: ProfessionalDevelopmentProgramRefId
element.desc: Reference to associated professional development program.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: Locally assigned number or provider referenced course number used to represent the course or activity

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: The starting date of the course or activity

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: The ending date of the course or activity

element.name: Description
element.desc: The description of the course or activity

element.name: ClockHours
element.desc: The actual number of hours required for the course or activity

element.name: Credits
element.desc: Number of credits that can be earned by completing the course or activity.

element.name: Stipend
element.desc: Tracks stipend being offered for this particular activity.

element.name: FundingSource
element.desc: Tracks the source of funding for this particular activity.

object.name: ProfessionalDevelopmentProgram
object.desc: The purpose of this object is for tracking sets of professional development activities. It creates a high-level relationship between professional development activities for tracking training programs, grant-funded professional development, or potentially individually created learning programs. The case for interoperability is that financial systems and instructional systems need to be aware of professional development programs for funding or alignment respectively.

element.name: LocalProgramId
element.desc: An element for setting local program identifiers.

element.name: ProgramName
element.desc: The name or title of the program.

element.name: ProgramType
element.desc: The type of program whether it be a grant, learning plan, or system training.

element.name: FundingSource
element.desc: The funding source of the program.

element.name: RegistrationStatus
element.desc: Tracks the status of the user in the professional development activity.

element.name: ProfessionalDevelopmentActivityRefId
element.desc: Relationship ID for professional development activity.

element.name: ProfessionalDevelopmentProgramRefId
element.desc: Relationship ID for professional development program.

element.name: PaidAmount
element.desc: This optional field is used if there is a fee for the professional development activity and for tracking the amount the user paid to participate in the professional development activity.

element.name: Stipend
element.desc: Optional field for tracking the amount the user is paid to participate in the professional development activity.

value.name: Registered
value.desc: Represents the user has registered for the activity.

value.name: Withdrawn
value.desc: Represents that the user has withdrawn from the activity without completing.

value.name: Complete
value.desc: Represents that a user has completed the activity and has received credit and show have a record in the employee credit object to represent this.

value.name: Incomplete
value.desc: Represents that the user did not receive credit for this activity for whatever reason.

value.name: In_Progress
value.desc: Represents that the user has not yet finished the ProfessionalDevelopmentActivity or ProfessionalDevelopmentProgram but hasn't withdrawn.

value.name: 0395_1242_RECIPROCATION_CREDENTIALS
value.desc: Credentials based on reciprocation with another state
